author: Daisy Jones, Zing Tsjeng
title: What It’s Like Self-Isolating With Someone You Just Started Dating
description: “I feel robbed of the excitement of the honeymoon period and my independence.”
content:
This article originally appeared on VICE UK.
As both a queer woman and victim of the housing crisis, I have more than enough empathy for anyone who has ever met someone off Hinge, decided they were the one based on their haircut and embarked on a date that s… [+7909 chars]
